ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia reached into one of his crates, pulled out an electronic component You can drain the energeon from this he said, tossing it in front of KitKat.

Phobia reached into one of his crates, pulled out an electronic 
component "You can drain the energeon from this" he said, tossing it 
in front of KitKat.

"Regain your strength and begin again, start with Rowdy and continue 
from there. Who is Rowdy?" he already knew part of the answer, he 
wanted the rest too.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She walked into the ship in wolf form.  She looked up at Phobia.
> "Rowdy, he's back.  And I couldn't get Megatron to understand what 
> was going on.  He thinks I'm daft and loosing my mind.  I can't get 
> him to understand.  We are still losing troops.  With out them, I 
> won't be able to carry out my plans."  She collapsed on the floor 
and 
> breathed heavily.  She rested her head on her paws. "And I can't 
> figure out how you can talk to me wihtout being there? That has 
> thrown me for a loop." (she still doesn't know about the spider 
baby 
> around her neck yet.)
> 
> She rested on the floor and gave a soft puppy whine,"And I have my 
> troops acting funny. Two bots who love pain. I can't even fathom 
how 
> a bot could come to love pain." She looked down. "I...I just don't 
> know what to do any more."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > The door of the ship slid open allowing KitKat entry, Phobia kept 
> his 
> > distance, he remembered how she looked when she wanted something, 
> she 
> > had that look now but he sensed a certain desperation to her 
voice.
> > 
> > "What can I do for you my sweet?" he said, adressing KitKat with 
> the 
> > tone of a subordinate.
> >
